question: You’re really busy at work and a colleague is telling you their life story and personal woes. You:

options.option: Don’t dare to interrupt them
Think it’s more important to give them some of your time; work can wait
Listen, but with only with half an ear
Interrupt and explain that you are really busy at the moment

question: You’ve been sitting in the doctor’s waiting room for more than 25 minutes. You:

options.option: Look at your watch every two minutes
Bubble with inner anger, but keep quiet
Explain to other equally impatient people in the room that the doctor is always running late
Complain in a loud voice, while tapping your foot impatiently

question: You’re having an animated discussion with a colleague regarding a project that you’re in charge of. You:

options.option: Don’t dare contradict them
Think that they are obviously right
Defend your own point of view, tooth and nail
IContinuously interrupt your colleague

question: Given the choice, I would prefer to:

options.option: have one or two very intimate friends, without getting acquainted with very many people
get acquainted with some people and become intimate friends with a chosen few
get acquainted with a lot of people and become friends with a few
get acquainted with a lot of people and become friends with as many as I can manage.
almost always leave as soon as I can
usually leave as soon as I can
usually stay as late as I can
almost always stay as late as I can

question: When I have free time I:

options.option: almost always prefer to spend time alone
usually prefer to spend time alone
usually prefer to do something with others
almost always prefer to do something with others
